name: Dr.Aparna V
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - St. Teresa's College, Kochi   - 2015M.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - Sacred Heart College, Kochi   - 2017Ph.D  ( Mathematics )  - Bharathiar University  - 04/21/2023Supervisor: Dr. N. Mohanapriya
in_brief: She has completed her Ph.D from Bharathiar University and has qualified GATE in 2019. Her research area of interest is graph theory and its applications. She has published papers in International journals.

publications.journal: NPTEL-AICTE Faculty Development Programme for the course Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms using Python
